ComicInfo.Summary: The Exiles return to Ground Zero to restore their name,but they are trapped by a group of ultra mercenaries and military units. Meanwhile, the alien menace Maxis has recovered and begin to search for new prey...
ComicInfo.Title: Dark Destiny
